item.title: Things that I learned in week 46
item.description: Building nodejs in Docker If you need to add keys to the keychain in a Travis build and you have problems with IPV6 (which Travis cannot handle), use the IPV4 keyservers as follows: RUN set -ex \ && for key in \ 94AE36675C464D64BAFA68DD7434390BDBE9B9C5 \ #â€¦. more keys... ; do \ gpg --keyserver hkp://ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key" || \ gpg --keyserver hkp://p80.pool.sks-keyservers.net:80 --recv-keys "$key" || \ gpg --keyserver hkp://ipv4.
